problem_text: A Japanese game company created the game the Legend of Zelda. All games in the Top 10 list are made by Japanese game companies. [BG] If a game sells more than one million copies, then it will be selected into the Top 10 list. The Legend of Zelda sold more than one million copies.
predicates:
Japanese(x) ::: x is a Japanese game company.
Created(x, y) ::: x created y.
Game(x) ::: x is a game.
LegendOfZelda(x) ::: x is the game the Legend of Zelda.
Top10(x) ::: x is in the Top 10 list.
Sell(x, y) ::: x sells y copies.
Million(y) ::: y is one million.
Select(x, y) ::: x is selected into y.

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? The game the Legend of Zelda was created by a Japanese game company and is in the Top 10 list.
tests.conclusions: Japanese(nintendo) ∧ Created(nintendo, zelda) ∧ Top10(zelda) ∧ LegendOfZelda(zelda) ::: The game the Legend of Zelda was created by a Japanese game company and is in the Top 10 list. TRUE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? A game that sells more than one million copies will be created by a Japanese game company.
tests.conclusions: ∃x ∃y (Sell(y, x) ∧ Million(x) → (Created(y, z) ∧ Japanese(y))) ::: A game that sells more than one million copies will be created by a Japanese game company. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If a game is created by a Japanese game company and sells more than one million copies, then it will be selected into the Top 10 list.
tests.conclusions: Created(legendOfZelda, japaneseGameCompany) ∧ Million(oneMillion) ∧ Sell(legendOfZelda, oneMillion) → Select(legendOfZelda, top10) ::: TRUE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? All games created by Japanese game companies are in the Top 10 list.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? The game the Legend of Zelda was created by a Japanese game company and was selected into the Top 10 list.
tests.conclusions: Created(legendOfZelda, company) ∧ Japanese(company) ∧ Select(legendOfZelda, Top10List) ::: TRUE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If the game the Legend of Zelda is in the Top 10 list, then it was created by a Japanese game company.
tests.conclusions: Top10(legendofzelda) → Japanese(creator) ::: If the game the Legend of Zelda is in the Top 10 list, then it was created by a Japanese game company. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If a game is in the Top 10 list, then it sells more than one million copies.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? All games created by Japanese game companies are games that sell more than one million copies.
tests.conclusions: ∀x (Japanese(x) ∧ Game(y) ∧ Created(x, y) → (Sell(y, z) ∧ Million(z))) ::: FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? The game the Legend of Zelda was created by a Japanese game company and it was selected into the Top 10 list.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If the game the Legend of Zelda was created by a Japanese game company, then it will be selected into the Top 10 list.
tests.conclusions: Japanese(japaneseGameCompany) ∧ Created(japaneseGameCompany, legendOfZelda) → Select(legendOfZelda, top10List) ::: TRUE

candidate_solutions.text:
# Predicates:
Japanese(x) ::: x is a Japanese game company.
Created(x, y) ::: x created y.
Game(x) ::: x is a game.
LegendOfZelda(x) ::: x is the game the Legend of Zelda.
Top10(x) ::: x is in the Top 10 list.
Sell(x, y) ::: x sells y copies.
Million(y) ::: y is one million.
Select(x, y) ::: x is selected into y.

# Premises:
∃x (Japanese(x) ∧ Created(x, theLegendOfZelda)) ::: A Japanese game company created the game the Legend of Zelda.
∀x (Top10(x) → ∃y (Japanese(y) ∧ Created(y, x))) ::: All games in the Top 10 list are made by Japanese game companies.
∀x (Game(x) ∧ Sell(x, y) ∧ Million(y) → Select(x, Top10)) ::: If a game sells more than one million copies, then it will be selected into the Top 10 list.
LegendOfZelda(theLegendOfZelda) ∧ Sell(theLegendOfZelda, y) ∧ Million(y) ::: The Legend of Zelda sold more than one million copies.
